name: Arena of Illusions
description:
Arena of Illusions is a Turn-based RPG which it's combat mechanics are based on the classic Legend of Legaia from the PSX. You input different commands to build a combo and, if the combination is correct, a special skill is activated. This is the basis for the combat, but there is so much more such as Stances, Skill Effects, Counters, etc.

In the current build, I opted to remove the Special option and will redesign it to better fit the game (if the project continues). Before, it was a simple magic menu with a few attacks that had conditions and special effects. I got a lot of ideas on how to improve it, but I really, really would like to hear feedback and suggestions from those that played it this prototype.

There's a bit of dialogue between fights whether you win or lose. The dialogue is available in English and Japanese (though the later one might have more than a few grammatical errors).

This is a prototype that was made, primarily, to learn UE4. The prototype is playable with keyboard and mouse and I really, really would like for you to play it and provide some feedback either here or by the Questionnaire (link inside the game). It's short, it's rough in a lot of ways, but I believe that it's a foundation of something that could become special. If it's possible, I would like to make it into a full game and properly expand the concepts shown in it.

Features:

- 48 Unique Skills. (Good luck trying to find them all).

- 9 Challenges

- 12 Unique Stances

- Ninjas Everywhere

Currently, there's a bug I could not pinpoint that occurs when you finish the game and try to make a New Game. The dialogue window does not show correctly. In that case, just relaunch the game and it should be fine. The cooked build seems a little bit less stable than the dev build I was testing, so if any bugs happen close the app and try again. Not sure why those weird bugs happened at first, but I couldn't properly replicate later them afterwards.

I hope you enjoy the short time you spend with it and for those that do give it a chance...

Welcome to the Arena of Illusions !
